thread.title: Jean Paul Gaultier - Wonder Woman and Superman
thread.title_full: Jean Paul Gaultier - Wonder Woman and Superman

title: Jean Paul Gaultier - Wonder Woman and Superman
text:
by: Sanja Pekic The new limited Eau Fraîche editions of the most popular fragrances from Jean Paul Gaultier , Classique and Le Male , are illustrated with the superheroes of DC Comics - Wonder Woman and Superman . The fragrances come out in March 2017 with compositions that are identical to last year's Betty Boop and Popeye releases. "Wonder Woman here: "I Love Gaultier" mission accepted. Extra-olfactory capacity: activated. Perfume identification: A torrid sugar syrup. Ready to identify ingredients! Incredible concoction of white flowers: check. Gourmand overdose of ginger: check. Lemon sorbet sweetened with sugarcane juice: check." Classique Wonder Woman Eau Fraîche opens with lemon sorbet, ginger and sugar cane juice. The heart includes Tiare flower, jasmine and orange blossom. The base consists of vanilla, musk and neo-labdanum. It will be available as a 50 ml Eau de Toilette . "Superman here: planet Gaultier localized. Extra-olfactory capacity: activated. Perfume identification: A sexy fabric softener. Ready to identify ingredients! Fresh departure with mint and Neroli: check. Union of sage and Tonka bean: check. Sensual notes of sandalwood and vanilla: check." Le Male Superman Eau Fraîche begins with notes of neroli, mint and aldehydes. The heart of sage and the Sclarene molecule are at the heart of the perfume, on a base of vanilla, tonka bean and sandalwood. It will be available as a 75 ml Eau de Toilette . 
Sanja Pekić 
Sanja joined the Fragrantica team in 2009 and writes and designs articles about perfume news. 
Advertisement avonman 
OMG..I've DIED And gone to HEAVEN....besides My Perfume Obsession I Also LOVE DC Comics So This a Match of a LIFETIME For Me, SO EXCITED A DEFINITE Buy for BOTH!!! Feb 2017 Add Your Review Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews. Advertisement
